title: Emerald Chandbali Earrings - "Marakathamani Kempu Jhumka"
materials: possibly platinum (to be confirmed). Features vibrant
faceted emeralds and sparkling cubic zirconia stones. Handcrafted filigree details add a touch of Hyderabadi elegance.
features: These chandbali earrings feature a classic Mughal-inspired design with a cascading arrangement of emeralds and cubic zirconia. The intricate filigree work around each stone enhances its brilliance. The jhumka-style bottom adds movement and a traditional South Indian touch.
colors: Predominantly white gold with vibrant green emeralds and clear cubic zirconia accents. The contrast creates a visually stunning and regal effect.
occasions: and other special occasions. Suitable for modern cocktail parties where you want to showcase an ethnic flair. Ideal for wearing with silk sarees
description: These earrings are a beautiful blend of traditional Mughal and South Indian styles, handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail. The high-quality emeralds offer a rich pop of color, while the cubic zirconia adds affordable brilliance. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear throughout the day or evening. A statement piece guaranteed to turn heads.
